backend/main.mo: Implements invite request and manager management with authorization, round‑robin assignment, and CRUD-style admin operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting deployment fix requirements and affected components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of human-written summaries for all frontend files describing UI components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom OKLCH design tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Simple path-based router rendering landing, admin, or member pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/InviteRequ: Admin table to view, filter, approve, and reject invite requests.
frontend/src/components/admin/ManagersRo: Admin interface to list, add, and remove managers via dialog and mutations.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button handling auth state and query cache resets.
frontend/src/components/pbblack/Callback: Modal flow for submitting a callback request with time window and notes, showing a confirmation screen after submission.
frontend/src/components/pbblack/Comparis: Shows a grid of comparison cards listing common insurance service problems with icons.
frontend/src/components/pbblack/Disclaim: Renders an informational disclaimer about PB Black's invite-only nature and service limitations.
frontend/src/components/pbblack/InviteRe: Form for submitting an invite request with validation and submission states, showing a confirmation screen when complete.
frontend/src/components/pbblack/InviteSt: Allows users to check invite status by email, displaying status details and manager info when available.
frontend/src/components/pbblack/MeetingS: Modal flow for scheduling a meeting by selecting type, date, time, and notes, followed by a confirmation screen.
frontend/src/components/pbblack/Policies: Displays a list of insurance policies with details and actions to contact or schedule with a manager.
frontend/src/components/pbblack/PremiumB: Wrapper around Button applying premium gold styling for consistent UI.
frontend/src/components/pbblack/PremiumD: Simple decorative horizontal divider with gold gradient styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, loading and managing user identities through AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks and mutations for invite requests, managers, user roles, and related admin actions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind styles and theme variables with a black‑and‑gold color scheme and custom utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/validators.ts: Contains simple validators for email, phone numbers, and LinkedIn handles or URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Sets up the app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Renders the admin panel with authentication and role checks, showing login, access‑denied, or admin management tabs.
frontend/src/pages/MemberDashboardPage.t: Displays the member dashboard with manager details and flows for callbacks, meetings, and policy interactions.
frontend/src/pages/PBBlackLandingPage.ts: Landing page component rendering the PB Black hero, audience sections, premium-themed UI, and navigation helpers including scroll-to-application and admin redirect.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL or hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration defining premium black‑and‑gold theming, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project state file describing PB Black's goals, architecture notes, features, and known issues for build planning.
